effect.x_y: Changes the weather to a sandstorm for five turns. Pokémon that are not ground, rock, or steel take 1/16 their max HP at the end of every turn. Every rock Pokémon’s original Special Defense is raised by 50% for the duration of this effect. solar beam’s power is halved. moonlight, morning sun, and synthesis only heal 1/4 the user’s max HP.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Changes the weather to a sandstorm for five turns. Pokémon that are not ground, rock, or steel take 1/16 their max HP at the end of every turn. Every rock Pokémon’s original Special Defense is raised by 50% for the duration of this effect. solar beam’s power is halved. moonlight, morning sun, and synthesis only heal 1/4 the user’s max HP.

short_effect.x_y: Changes the weather to a sandstorm for five turns.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Changes the weather to a sandstorm for five turns.

flavor_text.x_y: A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to hurt all combatants except the Rock, Ground, and Steel types.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to hurt all combatants except the Rock, Ground, and Steel types.
